• Executive Summary of the Audit 826.53 KB
• Reducing Crime and Disorder in Tameside ...Our 3 Year Strategy 888.92 KB
• Sorted - A Guide to Young People and the Law
• Victim of Crime

A warm welcome to this new and improved website. By building on past achievements and recognising the scope for improvement, the Tameside 'Crime and Disorder' website gives you, the public of Tameside the opportunity to take part in creating an environment in which people will feel free from crime and the fear of crime.
